CutSceneText.Text: Berone.... It really is you, love.
I...I've come too late. I'm sorry!
I thank you for keeping your promise...even now.
You've returned from the Abyss to fulfil your promise to me.
You defeated death itself to see me again.
Death? No, no, I'm not dead...
Now it's time to rest, my love.
Return to the flow of Aether and be at peace.
